product.name: NetBank Business
product.shortDescription: NBB is Nedbank's electonic banking system for businesses. It can be accessed anywhere, anytime, through the internet or a mobile device, by means of the Nedbank App Suite. NBB Mobile is a business app for convenient, on-the-go transactions.
salesHighlights: Designed to be integrated into the client's existing line-of-business software, NetBank Business allows for more efficient transaction processing through an import capability and reconciliation that allows for the export of statement information
Clients have the control to maintaina nd update their NBB profiles and lists of beneficiaries/collectees
NBB is a fully modular system; clients only pay for what they use
NBB has an easy-to-use eLearning tool and provides context-sensitive help pages

value: Balances, statements, cheque/cash deposit images and cash management reports can be requested and reviewed
Statements can be downloaded and exported, instead of being printed
Batches of payments, transfers and collections can be created, imported and maintained

Single and bulk transactions can be captured and authorised by means of EFTs, future-dated and same-day-value (SDV) payment types and through the collection service. These payment and collection instruments with their different attributes enable beneficiary value to be provided or received earlier or on specific dates, with tracking capability.
Notifications can be used to inform a beneficiary of payment.
Beneficiaries and collectees can be added, imported and maintained.
With regard to self-service capabilities: client can reset user passwords, maintain and delete users, create nicknames for company accounts and customise proof of payment.

NBB provides flexible options such as self-imposed limits, account validations, single and dual authorisation for beneficiaries, collectees and users, account limits, settings and payments, eBill payments and transfers, combining safety measures and segregation of duty to ensure peace of mind. All collections allow for dual authorisation.
Security is a top priority with NBB, and therefore security tokens, software and hardware certificates and passwords are used.
